iteraction.title: A Sales Action for Every Interaction
iteraction.desc: No matter what your sales process is, SalesAssist has a Sales Action to streamline your customer facing interactions, from e-Signatures to document collection to e-Forms.

completiontools.title: Embedded In and Fully Integrated With Your CRM
completiontools.desc: Have a complete arsenal of every possible info-gathering widget in a single panel, right from your CRM. All information and documents gathered enter your CRM in real time, with audit trail

actions.name: Get Docs
actions.title: Collect documents in real-time
actions.desc: Allow customers to upload documents on the spot with their mobile device. Stop chasing customers to scan and upload documents and increase the speed and completion rate.

actions.name: e-Form
actions.title: Make all your forms smart
actions.desc: Reduce unnecessary errors, increase the completion rate and shorten the form fill time, with forms that are made for mobile completion and are fully integrated with all of your existing systems.

actions.name: e-Signature
actions.title: Make e-Signatures fast, easy, mobile
actions.desc: Send customers agreements for e-Signatures that are designed for mobile completion. Complete sales agreements in real time, with much higher completion rates than legacy eSign.

actions.name: Product Sharing
actions.title: Better remote sales
actions.desc: Share product visuals and details while speaking with customers to ensure they are fully informed and excited about what they're purchasing.

actions.name: Request Referrals
actions.title: Maximize each relationship
actions.desc: Make it easy for customers to refer friends and family. As soon as customers share a referral a new opportunity is created and assigned in your CRM.

actions.name: Get Reviews
actions.title: Easily collect reviews
actions.desc: Make it extremely easy for your customers to leave a review. Send personalized text/email links that customers can tap and instantly leave reviews on their platform of choice.

actions.name: Secure Payments
actions.title: Collect payments seamlessly
actions.desc: Collect payments in real-time without web redirects or inefficient IVR systems. Using personalized payment links, quickly and securely collect payments wherever your customers and salespeople are.

actions.name: ID Verification
actions.title: Add convenient security
actions.desc: Stay secure without adding friction to your sales process. Use real-time ID verification straight from your customer's smartphones, eliminating the need for in-person visits or emailing of documents.

actions.name: Digital Consent
actions.title: Gain fast, easy and compliant consent
actions.desc: Eliminate the time consuming and error-prone script reading. Send customers a T&C they can accept immediately (e.g., through checkboxes) right from their mobile device.

automated.title: Complete Sales Faster with Automated Workflows
automated.desc: Info-gathering tools are scattered and don’t play nice together, we’re here to fix that. Connect all your info-gathering tools and create perfect custom-made workflows. Automate your sales team's work so they can crush sales goals.

completionprocess.title: Let Us Assist and Guide Your Info-Gathering Process
completionprocess.desc: Gathering information and documents from customers is often the most time consuming part of the business. We’ll assist your team with smart suggestions based on real time signals, so they know who, when, how and what to focus on to complete more sales.
